features.title: Validate step rules
features.description:
There are some rules which are technically valid but are not recommended due to readability.
These rules can be marked as Warning, Exception or Ignore. By default they are marked as warning.

features.title: Account Holder withdraws cash
features.description:
Account Holders should be able to withdraw cash at any of the
companies ATMs.

Rules:
* Account Holders should have a valid keycard
* Have sufficient available funds
* The ATM has the necessary funds

features.title: Beautiful Tea Shipping Costs
features.description:
* Australian customers pay GST
* Overseas customers dont pay GST
* Australian customers get free shipping for orders $100 and above
* Overseas customers all pay the same shipping rate regardless of order size

features.title: Step statement
features.description:
Step statements are used to define the details of a test, the supported steps are:
    given - sets up the state for the scenario
    when  - defines an action performed by a user/system
    then  - defines the outcome of the when steps
    and   - used by given/when/then to add additional context
    but   - used by given/when/then to provide an exclusion context
